title: Broccoli souffl√©
ingredients: ['100g broccoli', '40g butter', '40g plain flour', '230ml milk', '1 teaspoon chicken or vegetable stock granules', 'salt and black pepper to taste', 'nutmeg to taste', '100g ham, diced', '100g Gruyere cheese, grated', '4 eggs, separated', '1 clove garlic', 'finely chopped fresh parsley']
